article_metadata.author:
Bill Burt
bburt@eagletribune.com

og.description: NORTH ANDOVER — North Andover High has informed its boys basketball coach, Paul Tanglis, that he will be suspended for one year, according to Tanglis.
og.title: North Andover basketball coach suspended

article_metadata.description: NORTH ANDOVER — North Andover High has informed its boys basketball coach, Paul Tanglis, that he will be suspended for one year, according to Tanglis.
